name: Plants vs. Zombies but made in powerpoint
name_original: Plants vs. Zombies but made in powerpoint
description:
this game took me 5 months to make... idk why

Original Game by PopCap and Ea - https://www.ea.com/

Music by Laura Shigihara - https://www.laurashigihara.com/

From the creators of Trapped!, introducing Plants vs. Zombies! In Powerpoint but worse

HIGH-QUALITY fanmade game! that's pretty much it... 

Did you know that this game was made in PowerPoint? Pretty Cool right? I already said this and it's in the title...

The best part is, IT'S FREE! DOWNLOAD IT NOW! 

(AS LONG AS YOU HAVE POWERPOINT INSTALLED)

Plants vs. Zombie but in powerpoint but worse created by Sky Lavadia

THE GAME WAS INSPIRED BY TELLTALE'S WALKING DEAD, RIDDLE SCHOOL, and The Henry Stickmin Collection

subscribe pls - https://www.youtube.com/@NathGMG
